channel.title: Specicals, GodSwords and D-Bow!Weapon Stats + -
channel.description:
Ok I want to be able to have specials in my server. Like in real rs the dds, whip, god swords etc. specails. How would I do that? Is there a tut?
How do you change the stat effects of a weapon? Like the whip gives u, i think, 300+ Str bonus and how would i edit it so its like 600? And how would i change the stats for a weapon that gives 0+ everything like a sythe. Is there a tut for this too?
And how do i make the d-bow shoot arrows instead of hitting someone? Is there a tut for this also?
If anyone can give me the codes for this I would really appericate that
Thanks!!!!
